mainHero.title: Savy
mainHero.subtitle: Cart
mainHero.description: Create the grocery list and carry it in your pocket. no more pencil and paper.

items.title: Shopping History
items.description: Access and review your shopping history, empowering you to make smarter decisions and analyze your spending patterns.

items.title: Synchronized Cloud Storage
items.description: Safeguard your data with secure cloud storage, ensuring seamless synchronization across all your devices.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: Join us on this exciting journey as we transform the way you experience shopping. Download SavyCart today and discover how to turn your shopping into more than just a taskâ€”elevating it to an optimized and rewarding experience.

items.name: Product List Management
items.description: Create, edit, and organize product lists with ease. Customize your lists to suit your needs and preferences.

items.name: Purchase History
items.description: Keep a detailed record of all your past purchases. Quickly access your previous lists and ensure no essential items are forgotten.

items.name: Price Tracking
items.description: Observe how prices of your favorite products fluctuate over time. Our price tracking feature helps you make informed decisions and save money.

items.name: Customized Configuration
items.description: Tailor the app to your shopping style. Add preferred brands, measurement units, specific categories, and favorite products for a unique experience.
